languages.text: {n}Природа этого существа слишком отдалилась от благословенного генетического кода Человечества. Кредо не видит за подобными отклонениями людей и велит безжалостно уничтожать подобных созданий.{/n}

{n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Mankind's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Природа этого существа слишком отдалилась от благословенного генетического кода Человечества. Кредо не видит за подобными отклонениями людей и велит безжалостно уничтожать подобных созданий.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Humanity's blessed genome. The Creed, seeing no humanity behind deviations like these, commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}
{n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Humanity's blessed genome. The Creed, seeing no humanity behind deviations like these, commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

{n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Humanity's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

{n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Humanity's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

{n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Mankind's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La naturaleza de este ser se ha distanciado demasiado del bendito genoma de la Humanidad. El credo no considera humanos a estos degenerados y por lo tanto exige su exterminio sin compasión alguna.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Mankind's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La naturaleza de este ser se ha distanciado demasiado del bendito genoma de la Humanidad. El credo no considera humanos a estos degenerados y por lo tanto exige su exterminio sin compasión alguna.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个人的样子已经偏离人类受祝福的基因太远太远了。帝国国教认为，一旦发生了这样的变异，就已经算不上是人类了，因此下令毫不留情地消灭这种生物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Mankind's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人的样子已经偏离人类受祝福的基因太远太远了。帝国国教认为，一旦发生了这样的变异，就已经算不上是人类了，因此下令毫不留情地消灭这种生物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}この生物の在り方は、人類の祝福された遺伝子情報から大きく逸脱している。信条では、こういう人間離れした生物に人間性を認めておらず、容赦なく駆除することを命じている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Mankind's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この生物の在り方は、人類の祝福された遺伝子情報から大きく逸脱している。信条では、こういう人間離れした生物に人間性を認めておらず、容赦なく駆除することを命じている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dieses Wesen hat sich zu weit vom gesegneten Genom der Menschheit entfernt. Der Glaube erkennt in derlei Abweichungen nichts Menschliches und befiehlt daher, solche Kreaturen ohne Gnade auszulöschen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Mankind's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieses Wesen hat sich zu weit vom gesegneten Genom der Menschheit entfernt. Der Glaube erkennt in derlei Abweichungen nichts Menschliches und befiehlt daher, solche Kreaturen ohne Gnade auszulöschen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La nature de cet être s'éloigne beaucoup trop du génome humain béni. Le Crédo ne reconnaît pas l'humanité des créatures déviantes de ce genre et exige donc qu'elles soient exterminées sans pitié.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This being's nature has strayed too far from Mankind's blessed genome. The Creed sees no humanity in deviations like these, and so it commands that such creatures be exterminated without mercy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La nature de cet être s'éloigne beaucoup trop du génome humain béni. Le Crédo ne reconnaît pas l'humanité des créatures déviantes de ce genre et exige donc qu'elles soient exterminées sans pitié.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu mahlukun doğası, İnsanlığın kutsanmış gen havuzundan sapmış. İtikat, bu tür sapkınlarda insanlık zerresi olmadığına inandığından merhamet gösterilmeksizin hepsinin idamını emrediyor.{/n}
